name: Homemade Angel Food Cake
author: Revella Schlosser
instructions: Sift together flour and powdered sugar 3 times. Set aside. Beat egg whites, cream of tarter, and salt until foamy. Gradually add 1 tablespoon of sugar at a time and beat until very stiff. Fold in vanilla and almond. Sift 1/4 of flour and powdered sugar at a time and fold in gently. Pour in pan. Bake at 375Â° for 30 to 35 minutes.
